createitem.title: Creating Article
createitem.paso1:
:one: Article name:
*This name must be unique and must not be more than 50 characters.*
createitem.paso2:
:two: Purchase price of the item:
*It cannot be a negative number. So that this article cannot be bought put `skip`*
createitem.paso3:
:three: Sale price of the item:
*It cannot be a negative number. So that this item cannot be sold, put `skip`*
createitem.paso5:
:five: Item emoji:
*Useful for inventory items. Mandatory for junk items for commands, otherwise you can put `skip`*
createitem.paso6:
:six: Was this item hidden from inventory?
*Put `yes` or `no`*
createitem.paso7:
:seven: Can this article be transferred between users?
*Place `yes` o `no`*
createitem.paso8:
:eight: Is it a junk item?
*Put `yes` or` no`, these items are for the corresponding commands.*
createitem.paso9:
:nine: Can only be purchased once per user?
*Put `yes` o `no`*
createitem.paso10:
:one::zero: Time this item will stay in store
*Example: 4d, 1m, 3m, 7h otherwise, put `skip` or` infinity`*
createitem.paso11:
:one::one:Stock of this item available in the store
*Set `skip` or` infinity` if you want them to be unlimited*
createitem.paso12:
:one::two: Role or Channel that is given when purchasing an item
*Example: @RolPremium, text channel, voice channel. The channel will be created private for the user. Put 'skip' if you don't want to be told anything.*
createitem.paso13:
:one::three: Role required to buy this item
*Example: @RolBronce put `skip` if not required.*
createitem.paso14:
:one::four: Money required to purchase this item
*Put `skip` or` infinity` if no minimum balance is required.*
createitem.paso15:
:one::five: Role that is removed when purchasing or using the item.
*Places `skip` if no minimum balance is required.*
createitem.paso16:
:one::six: Message to be displayed when using or buying the item.
*Maximum 1000 characters*
createitem.noCreado: ❌ | Article not created. Don't have an emoji being a junk item.
createitem.existe: ❌ | This item already exists, delete or edit it.
createitem.noCrearCanal: ❌ | I don't have permission to create channels on this server.
createitem.noRoles: ❌ | I do not have permission to manage roles on this server.
createitem.noRol: ❌ | Role not found or invalid role. Please verify that it exists.
createitem.noManejable: ❌ | I can't seem to handle this role.
